Website Fundamentals

Here you can find basic information about website so that you can start using them to do what you've always wanted to do.

What exactly is a website?

At it's very basics a website is a group of web pages revolving around a certain topic under the same domain. Websites are communication tools and they can be used to display different types of information. This website is about website development and design.

How To Make A Website

Overcomplicating Website Development To me, a lot of "how to make a website" tutorials are very confusing with a lot of extra details that take away from getting a basic grasp of website design.
